project.name: CHS CNP sondeos seleccionados en el fichero xyts.xml

master.select: select a.masub , a.nomacu, i1.cod, st_x(i1.geom), st_y(i1.geom) from ipas.ipa1 i1 left join ipas.acuiferos a on (i1.acuifero = a.cod_acu) where a.cod_acu = '095' order by a.masub , a.nomacu, i1.cod

upper_ts.select: select ipa2.fecha, ipa1.z-ipa2.pnp as cnp from ipas.ipa1 join ipas.ipa2 using(cod) where ipa1.cod=%s and ipa2.fecha>=%s and ipa2.fecha<=%s and ipa2.situacion!='no' order by ipa2.fecha;

upper_relation.select_location: select st_x(geom) x, st_y(geom) y from ipas.ipa1 where cod=%s;

lower_relation.select: select codmasac from ipas.ipa1_pmes_masubc where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and variable='pmes' and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS CNP red piezométrica oficial: sondeos medidos en 2020

master.select: with s1 as ( select i2.cod from ipas.ipa2 i2 where i2.fecha>'2020-01-01' and i2.fecha<'2021-01-01' and i2.proyecto = 'chs_red_pz' and i2.situacion!='no' group by i2.cod ) select a.masub , a.nomacu, i1.cod, st_x(i1.geom), st_y(i1.geom), r.cod_red from ipas.ipa1 i1 join s1 using(cod) left join ipas.ipa1_red_control r using(cod) left join ipas.acuiferos a on (i1.acuifero=a.cod_acu) where r.red='chspz' order by a.masubn , a.nomacu, i1.cod;

upper_ts.select: select ipa2.fecha, ipa1.z-ipa2.pnp as cnp from ipas.ipa1 join ipas.ipa2 using(cod) where ipa1.cod=%s and ipa2.fecha>=%s and ipa2.fecha<=%s and ipa2.situacion!='no' order by ipa2.fecha;

upper_relation.select_location: select st_x(geom) x, st_y(geom) y from ipas.ipa1 where cod=%s;

lower_relation.select: select codmasac from ipas.ipa1_pmes_masubc where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and variable='pmes' and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS CNP red piezométrica oficial: prec. mensual en masub

master.select: select acuiferos.masub, acuiferos.nomacu, ipa1.cod, ipa1.x_utm, ipa1.y_utm, ipa1_red_control.cod_red from ipas.ipa1 left join ipas.acuiferos on acuiferos.cod_acu = ipa1.acuifero left join ipas.ipa1_red_control using(cod) where ipa1_red_control.red='chspz' and ipa1_red_control.fecha_baja is null order by acuiferos.masubn, acuiferos.nomacu, ipa1.cod;

upper_ts.select: select ipa2.fecha, ipa1.z-ipa2.pnp as cnp from ipas.ipa1 inner join ipas.ipa2 on ipa1.cod=ipa2.cod where ipa1.cod=%s and ipa2.fecha>=%s and ipa2.fecha<=%s and ipa2.situacion!='no' order by ipa2.fecha;

upper_relation.select_location: select x_utm, y_utm from ipas.ipa1 where cod=%s;

lower_relation.select: select masub from ipas.ipa1 where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS CNP red piezométrica oficial medida por INTECSA hasta abr 2016

master.select: select acuiferos.masub, acuiferos.nomacu, ipa1.cod, ipa1.x_utm, ipa1.y_utm, ipa1_red_control.codigochs from ipas.ipa1 left join ipas.acuiferos on acuiferos.cod_acu = ipa1.acuifero left join ipas.ipa1_red_control on ipa1_red_control.codigo = ipa1.cod where ipa1_red_control.red='p' and (ipa1_red_control.fecha_baja is null or or ipa1_red_control.fecha_baja<'2016-05-01') order by acuiferos.masubn, acuiferos.nomacu, ipa1.cod;

title.text: Evolución de la cota piezométrica en el sondeo {} ({})

upper_ts.select: select ipa2.fecha, ipa1.z-ipa2.pnp as cnp and ipa2.situacion!='no' from ipas.ipa1 inner join ipas.ipa2 on ipa1.cod=ipa2.cod where ipa1.cod=%s and ipa2.fecha>=%s and ipa2.fecha<=%s order by ipa2.fecha;

upper_relation.select_location: select x_utm, y_utm from ipas.ipa1 where cod=%s;

lower_relation.select: select nmasub from ipas.ipa1_masub where dh=7 and cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, pm from ipas.masubc_pm where dh=7 and nmasub=%s and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS PNP red piezométrica oficial medida por INTECSA hasta abr 2016

master.select: select acuiferos.masub, acuiferos.nomacu, ipa1.cod, ipa1.x_utm, ipa1.y_utm, ipa1_red_control.cod_red from ipas.ipa1 left join ipas.acuiferos on acuiferos.cod_acu = ipa1.acuifero left join ipas.ipa1_red_control using(cod) where ipa1_red_control.red='p' and (ipa1_red_control.fecha_baja is null or ipa1_red_control.fecha_baja<'2016-05-01') order by acuiferos.masubn, acuiferos.nomacu, ipa1.cod;

title.text: Evolución de la profundidad del agua en el sondeo {} ({})

upper_ts.select: select ipa2.fecha, ipa2.pnp as pnp and ipa2.situacion!='no' from ipas.ipa1 inner join ipas.ipa2 on ipa1.cod=ipa2.cod where ipa1.cod=%s and ipa2.fecha>=%s and ipa2.fecha<=%s order by ipa2.fecha;

upper_relation.select_location: select x_utm, y_utm from ipas.ipa1 where cod=%s;

lower_relation.select: select nmasub from ipas.ipa1_masub where dh=7 and cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, pm from ipas.masubc_pm where dh=7 and nmasub=%s and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS Aforos Red OPH medidos en un rango de fechas especificado en el fichero xyts.xml

master.select: with s1 as ( select cod from ipas.ipa3 where proyecto='42173' and fecha>'2020-11-01' and fecha<'2020-12-15' ) select a.masub , a.nomacu , i1.cod, st_x(i1.geom) x, st_y(i1.geom) y, i1.toponimia , rc.descri red from ipas.ipa1 i1 join s1 using(cod) left join ipas.acuiferos a on (i1.acuifero=a.cod_acu) left join ipas.ipa1_red_control irc using(cod) join ipas.red_control rc using (red) where (irc.red='h1' or irc.red='h5' or irc.red='h8' or irc.red='h9') order by a.masub , a.nomacu , i1.cod;

upper_ts.select: select fecha, caudal_ls from ipas.ipa3 where cod=%s and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

lower_relation.select: select codmasac from ipas.ipa1_pmes_masubc where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and variable='pmes' and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS CNP Red OPH sondeos de manantiales (fechas en xml) con prec. mensual en masub

master.select: select a.masub, a.nomacu, i1.cod, i1.toponimia, rc.descri red, st_x(i1.geom) x, st_y(i1.geom) y from ipas.ipa1 i1 left join ipas.acuiferos a on (i1.acuifero=a.cod_acu) join ipas.ipa2 i2 using(cod) join ipas.ipa1_red_control irc using(cod) join ipas.red_control rc using(red) where i2.proyecto='42173' and irc.red = 'h12' and i2.fecha>'2020-11-01' and i2.fecha<'2020-12-05' order by a.masub, a.nomacu , i1.cod, rc.descri;

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, i1.z-i2.pnp cnp from ipas.ipa1 i1 join ipas.ipa2 i2 using(cod) where i1.cod=%s and i2.fecha>=%s and i2.fecha<=%s and i2.situacion!='no' order by i2.fecha;

lower_relation.select: select codmasac from ipas.ipa1_pmes_masubc where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and variable='pmes' and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS PNP en Red OPH humedales (fechas en xml) con prec. mensual en masub

master.select: select a.masub, a.nomacu, i1.cod, i1.toponimia, rc.descri red, st_x(i1.geom) x, st_y(i1.geom) y from ipas.ipa1 i1 left join ipas.acuiferos a on (i1.acuifero=a.cod_acu) join ipas.ipa2 i2 using(cod) join ipas.ipa1_red_control irc using(cod) join ipas.red_control rc using(red) where i2.proyecto='42173' and irc.red = 'h4' and i2.fecha>'2020-11-01' and i2.fecha<'2020-12-05' order by a.masub, a.nomacu , i1.cod, rc.descri;

title.text: Profundidad del agua en el sondeo {} ({})

upper_ts.select: select fecha, pnp from ipas.ipa2 where cod=%s and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

lower_relation.select: select codmasac from ipas.ipa1_pmes_masubc where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and variable='pmes' and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

project.name: CHS altura de escala Red OPH lagunas (fechas en xml) con prec. mensual en masub

master.select: select a.masub, a.nomacu , i1.cod, st_x(i1.geom) x, st_y(i1.geom) y, i1.toponimia from ipas.ipa1 i1 left join ipas.acuiferos a on(i1.acuifero=a.cod_acu) join ipas.ipa2_h i2 using(cod) where i2.proyecto = '42173' and i2.fecha >='2020-11-01' and i2.fecha <='2020-12-05' order by a.masub, a.nomacu , i1.cod;

title.text: Altura de agua en la escala {} ({})

upper_ts.select: select fecha, h from ipas.ipa2_h where cod=%s and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

lower_relation.select: select codmasac from ipas.ipa1_pmes_masubc where cod=%s;

lower_ts.select: select fecha, value from met.interpolated_tseries where fid=%s and variable='pmes' and fecha>=%s and fecha<=%s order by fecha;

master.select: select distinct i1.gid, i1.nomacu , i1.z , st_x(i1.geom) x, st_y(i1.geom) y from ipasr.ipa1_aquif i1 join ipasr.ipa2_aquif i2 using(gid) where i2.fecha>='2019-01-01' and i2.fecha<='2020-12-01' order by i1.gid

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, i1.z-i2.pnp cnp from ipasr.ipa1_aquif i1 join ipasr.ipa2_aquif i2 using(gid) where i2.gid= %s and i2.fecha >= %s and i2.fecha <= %s order by i2.gid, i2.fecha;

lower_relation.select: select t1.indicativo from ipasr.ipa2_aquif_open_data t1 where t1.gid = %s;

lower_ts.select: select t1.fecha, t1.prec from aemet.day t1 where t1.indicativo = %s and t1.fecha >= %s and t1.fecha <= %s and t1.prec > 2 order by t1.indicativo, t1.fecha;

master.select: select distinct i1.gid, i1.nomacu , i1.z , st_x(i1.geom) x, st_y(i1.geom) y from ipasr.ipa1_aquif i1 join ipasr.ipa2_aquif i2 using(gid) where i2.fecha>='2019-01-01' and i2.fecha<='2020-12-01' order by i1.gid

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, pnp cnp from ipasr.ipa2_aquif i2 where i2.gid= %s and i2.fecha >= %s and i2.fecha <= %s order by i2.gid, i2.fecha;

lower_relation.select: select t1.indicativo from ipasr.ipa2_aquif_open_data t1 where t1.gid = %s;

lower_ts.select: select t1.fecha, t1.prec from aemet.day t1 where t1.indicativo = %s and t1.fecha >= %s and t1.fecha <= %s and t1.prec > 2 order by t1.indicativo, t1.fecha;

project.name: BDA CNP red pz + axiliares en rango fechas especificadas en xyts.xml

master.select: with s1 as ( select distinct i2.c_hoja, i2.c_oct, i2.c_toma from public.ipa2 i2 where i2.cod_proyecto = '42174c02' and i2.fecha > '2020-10-01' order by i2.c_hoja, i2.c_oct, i2.c_toma ), s2 as ( select i1.c_hoja, i1.c_oct, i1.c_toma, a.nom_acu from ipa1 i1 join public.acu a using(c_acu) join s1 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) order by i1.c_hoja, i1.c_oct, i1.c_toma ) select concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma) cod, t.nombre , st_x(t.geom), st_y(t.geom), s2.nom_acu from public.toma t join s2 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) where t.tipo='B' order by s2.nom_acu, concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma)

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, t.z-i2.pnp cnp from public.toma t join public.ipa2 i2 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) where t.tipo='B' and concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma)=%s and i2.fecha > %s and i2.fecha < %s order by i2.fecha

upper_relation.select: select concat(t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2) "fid2" from public.ipa1_self t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s order by t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2
upper_relation.select_location: select st_x(t.geom) x, st_y(t.geom) y from public.toma t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s

lower_relation.select: select c.c_clima from cli_toma c where c.tipo='B' and concat(c.c_hoja , c.c_oct , c.c_toma) = %s

lower_ts.select: select t.fh_medida, t.precip from cl_precip_diaria t where t.c_clima = %s and t.precip>1 and t.fh_medida > %s and t.fh_medida < %s order by t.fh_medida

project.name: BDA PNP red pz + axiliares en rango fechas especificadas en xyts.xml

master.select: with s1 as ( select distinct i2.c_hoja, i2.c_oct, i2.c_toma from public.ipa2 i2 where i2.cod_proyecto = '42174c02' and i2.fecha > '2020-10-01' order by i2.c_hoja, i2.c_oct, i2.c_toma ), s2 as ( select i1.c_hoja, i1.c_oct, i1.c_toma, a.nom_acu from ipa1 i1 join public.acu a using(c_acu) join s1 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) order by i1.c_hoja, i1.c_oct, i1.c_toma ) select concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma) cod, t.nombre , st_x(t.geom), st_y(t.geom), s2.nom_acu from public.toma t join s2 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) where t.tipo='B' order by s2.nom_acu, concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma)

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, i2.pnp from public.toma t join public.ipa2 i2 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) where t.tipo='B' and concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma)=%s and i2.fecha > %s and i2.fecha < %s order by i2.fecha

upper_relation.select: select concat(t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2) "fid2" from public.ipa1_self t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s order by t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2
upper_relation.select_location: select st_x(t.geom) x, st_y(t.geom) y from public.toma t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s

lower_relation.select: select c.c_clima from cli_toma c where c.tipo='B' and concat(c.c_hoja , c.c_oct , c.c_toma) = %s

lower_ts.select: select t.fh_medida, t.precip from cl_precip_diaria t where t.c_clima = %s and t.precip>1 and t.fh_medida > %s and t.fh_medida < %s order by t.fh_medida

master.select: with ipa as ( select ipa1.c_hoja, ipa1.c_oct, ipa1.c_toma, ipa1.tipo, ipa1.prof, acu.nom_acu from ipa1 left join acu using(c_acu) ), propiet as ( select t.c_tit , t.nombre , tt.descripcion from public.titul t join public.titul_tipo tt using(tipotitular) order by t.c_tit) select concat(t1.c_hoja, t1.c_oct, t1.c_toma) "id", ipa.nom_acu, tm.descri tm , t1.nombre, propiet.nombre propietario, propiet.descripcion "tipo propietario", ipa.prof, to_char(t3.fecha_alta, 'dd/mm/yyyy') "fecha alta en la red", st_x(t1.geom) x, st_y(t1.geom) y, t1.z, t1.geom from toma t1 join ipa using(c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma, tipo) join toma_redcontrol t3 using(c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma, tipo) join public.tm using(c_tm, c_prov) left join propiet on (t1.tit=propiet.c_tit) where t1.tipo = 'B' and t3.red = 'P' and t3.fecha_baja is null

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, t.z-i2.pnp cnp from public.toma t join public.ipa2 i2 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) where t.tipo='B' and concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma)=%s and i2.fecha > %s and i2.fecha < %s order by i2.fecha

upper_relation.select: select concat(t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2) "fid2" from public.ipa1_self t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s order by t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2
upper_relation.select_location: select st_x(t.geom) x, st_y(t.geom) y from public.toma t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s

lower_relation.select: select c.c_clima from cli_toma c where c.tipo='B' and concat(c.c_hoja , c.c_oct , c.c_toma) = %s

lower_ts.select: select t.fh_medida, t.precip from cl_precip_diaria t where t.c_clima = %s and t.precip>1 and t.fh_medida > %s and t.fh_medida < %s order by t.fh_medida

project.name: BDA CNP sondeos especificados en xyts.xml

master.select: with ipa as ( select ipa1.c_hoja, ipa1.c_oct, ipa1.c_toma, ipa1.tipo, ipa1.prof, acu.nom_acu from ipa1 left join acu using(c_acu) where (ipa1.c_hoja='3032' and ipa1.c_oct='2' and ipa1.c_toma='0068' or ipa1.c_hoja='2932' and ipa1.c_oct='7' and ipa1.c_toma='0026') ) select concat(t1.c_hoja, t1.c_oct, t1.c_toma) "id", ipa.nom_acu, t1.nombre, tm.descri tm, ipa.prof, st_x(t1.geom) x, st_y(t1.geom) y, t1.z, t1.geom from toma t1 join ipa using(c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma, tipo) left join public.tm tm using(c_tm, c_prov) where t1.tipo = 'B'

upper_ts.select: select i2.fecha, t.z-i2.pnp cnp from public.toma t join public.ipa2 i2 using (c_hoja, c_oct, c_toma) where t.tipo='B' and concat(t.c_hoja, t.c_oct, t.c_toma)=%s and i2.fecha > %s and i2.fecha < %s order by i2.fecha

upper_relation.select: select concat(t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2) "fid2" from public.ipa1_self t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s order by t.c_hoja2 , t.c_oct2 , t.c_toma2
upper_relation.select_location: select st_x(t.geom) x, st_y(t.geom) y from public.toma t where concat(t.c_hoja , t.c_oct , t.c_toma) = %s

lower_relation.select: select c.c_clima from cli_toma c where c.tipo='B' and concat(c.c_hoja , c.c_oct , c.c_toma) = %s

lower_ts.select: select t.fh_medida, t.precip from cl_precip_diaria t where t.c_clima = %s and t.precip>1 and t.fh_medida > %s and t.fh_medida < %s order by t.fh_medida
